title: Plan Production Line Retooling
description: A production manager needs to plan for a scheduled shutdown of the assembly line to retool for the next model year.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official project plan for the model year changeover, noting the required downtime.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the project requires a 72-hour shutdown.

tasks.description: Create a detailed shutdown schedule, coordinating with maintenance, robotics, and logistics teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and distributes a minute-by-minute schedule for the retooling process.

tasks.description: Adjust the master production schedule to account for the planned downtime, ensuring production targets are met before the shutdown.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent increases the production rate in the weeks leading up to the shutdown to build up a buffer.
